de.dfki.adom.rest.nodes

Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.Restlet
      • de.dfki.adom.rest.nodes.Component
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.restlet.Uniform
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Block, BlockIDs, BlockManager, FeatureNegotiation, Header, ListMemories, Management, MetaInfo, Payload, PayloadAppend, Query, SpecificBlock, Storage, Sync, Toc

    public class Component
extends org.restlet.Restlet
    A blueprint offering basic functionality for nodes of the REST interface, like handling HTTP commands and issuing errors.
    Author:
    Christian Hauck

      • getBlockID

        public java.lang.String getBlockID(BlockManager blockManager,
                                   org.restlet.Request request,
                                   int positionFromEnd)
        Delivers the block ID string of the block associated with the Component.
        Parameters:
        blockManager - The handling BlockManager
        request - The request
        positionFromEnd - Position of the block identifier in the REST request, counted from the end of the URL.
        Returns:
        Component's block ID string.
